name: Old Facebook Newsfeed
description: Restores the Newsfeed to its original 13px font size so you don't have to feel like you're going blind, removes the line break after names in status updates, and removes right side "Ticker", "People to Subscribe To" and "Sponsored" sections so it's not such a seizure-inducing clusterf*ck. Take that Zuckerberg.
additional_info: 9/21/11 Update: Removed the new "Ticker", "People to Subscribe To" and "Sponsored" sections on the right side because they're incredibly annoying. It's not totally back to "normal" but it's a start.
